text:
I thought maybe I'd get to hold a water gun~
and got all excited...!

Haha, I get it.
It's not every day you get a chance like this, huh?

Yeah! Exactly!
I got a little too hyped...!

No, not at all.
Hey, how about trying that pose again?
Let's take a picture and upload it to Twesta

! Yes!
I'll do it, I'll do it!
